subject: Aggregating results from RunListener with JUnitCore ?
msgSnippet: I am trying to create a per-class aggregation of the output from the junitcore run-listener, as is done by default in for instance maven surefire-plugin. I
messageBody:
I am trying to create a per-class aggregation of the output from the junitcore run-listener, as is done by default in for instance maven surefire-plugin.

I have a solution that works, but unfortunately it's a kind of ketchup-bottle solution; I have to wait for the entire test-run to finish before I can know which tests have been run for the individual test classes, mostly because I do not have any sensible way to know which tests will be run for a given class.

Anyone have any suggestions as to how to solve this ?

Kristian
